mapper.insert: insert into tl_school_advertisement (advertisement_id, school_ID, title, subtitle, content, target, start_time, end_time, status, create_time) values (#{advertisementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tl_school_advertisement set school_ID = #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subtitle = #{subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, target = #{target,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where advertisement_id = #{advertisementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select advertisement_id, school_ID, title, subtitle, content, target, start_time, end_time, status, create_time from tl_school_advertisement where advertisement_id = #{advertisementId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
